index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing concurrent transfer of jurisdictions over certain City (City Light Department) property in the southwest 1/4 of the southwest 1/4 of Section 3, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M., acquired from Puget Sound Power and Light Company pursuant to Ordinance 79165, to the department of Construction and Land Use for access across the power transmission line right-of-way for installation and maintenance of utilities to serve the proposed police academy; also, transfer of certain City (Department of Construction and Land Use) property in the northeast 1/4 of the southwest 1/4 of Section 30, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M., acquired for greenbelt pursuant to Ordinance 72081, to allow relocation and maintenance of a number of power poles implaced along Highland Park Southwest. (P.M. \#240430-3-001 and P.M. \#230430-3-303).
